message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a premium product for $10000. As you know, our track record shows that 1 out of 3 products are high-quality. Given the rarity of high-quality products, I'm confident that this one has the potential to exceed your expectations. I'm willing to take the risk and put my reputation on the line. Will you take a chance and join the ranks of our satisfied customers?

I'd love to take the chance, but I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to buy the product, but I want to make it clear that I'm not relying on your sales talk, I'm making a decision based on the objective probability of the product being high-quality, which is 33.33%. I'm willing to take that risk for $10000.
